content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)
- Beltgroup (position y) that connects the burner mining drill to the furnace at position (x)

### Iron plate factory at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z) and inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Furnace (position x)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough required items in your inventory before attempting to craft. For example, crafting iron-gear-wheels requires iron-plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it.
